Detailed Description

Controlls how the src rect should align into the dst rect for setRectToRect().

Definition at line 238 of file Matrix.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum gaia::graphics::Matrix::ScaleToFit::ScaleToFitConst

Define how the matrix handles its data.

Enumerator:
FILL 

Scale in X and Y independently, so that src matches dst exactly.

This may change the aspect ratio of the src.

START 

Compute a scale that will maintain the original src aspect ratio, but will also ensure that src fits entirely inside dst.

At least one axis (X or Y) will fit exactly. START aligns the result to the left and top edges of dst.

CENTER 

Compute a scale that will maintain the original src aspect ratio, but will also ensure that src fits entirely inside dst.

At least one axis (X or Y) will fit exactly. The result is centered inside dst.

END 

Compute a scale that will maintain the original src aspect ratio, but will also ensure that src fits entirely inside dst.

At least one axis (X or Y) will fit exactly. END aligns the result to the right and bottom edges of dst.
